x1 = x_input[:, 0].reshape((1, n_steps, n_features))
x2 = x_input[:, 1].reshape((1, n_steps, n_features))
yhat = model.predict([x1, x2], verbose=0)
print(yhat)
Listing 8.33: Example of a Multi-headed CNN for forecasting a dependent time series.
Running the example prepares the data, ﬁts the model, and makes a prediction.
Note: Given the stochastic nature of the algorithm, your speciﬁc results may vary. Consider
running the example a few times.
